title: Calendar Court-Ordered Deadlines
description: A paralegal receives a scheduling order from a court and must calendar all deadlines.

tasks.description: Scan the scheduling order document and extract all dates and corresponding deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a list of dates and events (e.g., 'Discovery Cutoff: Oct 31', 'Final Pretrial Conference: Nov 15').

tasks.description: For each deadline, create an entry in the firm's master calendar and the specific case calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the calendars with the deadlines.

tasks.description: Set up automated reminders for the case team for 14 days, 7 days, and 1 day before each deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent configures the necessary reminders to prevent missed deadlines.
